name: Chi-Yu
flavorText: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

previous.name: Ting-Lu
previous.flavorText: The fear poured into an ancient ritual vessel has clad itself in rocks and dirt to become a Pokémon.

next.name: Roaring Moon
next.flavorText: It is possible that this is the creature listed as Roaring Moon in an expedition journal that still holds many mysteries.
